data.description:
Meet "Rosa", an AI-powered character who brings the virtual cafe to life. Engage in natural conversations by chatting with the virtual waitress. Your words are analyzed, and the advanced GPT AI responds to your input, all through voice interaction.

Step into the inviting ambiance of La Barca, complete with warm lighting and the comforting scent of coffee. Immerse yourself in the tranquil atmosphere as you enjoy the soothing tunes of the lofi radio, creating a peaceful backdrop for your experience.

Indulge your cravings by placing orders for delicious drinks and desserts using just your voice. From a rich espresso to a tasty chocolate cupcake, the experience is heightened by the seamless integration of voice commands. 
Additionally, all commands are available without AI voice control.
To ensure seamless voice interactions and cover server and development costs, we've introduced "GPT Credits."

HIGHLIGHTS:

- Cutting-Edge Immersion: state-of-the-art technology for an unparalleled immersive experience.
- La Barca Ambiance: Enjoy warm lighting, the scent of coffee, and lofi radio tunes for a truly immersive atmosphere.
- Meet "Rosa": Engage in natural conversations with AI-powered character "Rosa" for a personalized experience.
- Seamless Voice Control: Effortlessly place orders for drinks and desserts using voice commands, enhancing convenience.
- Multi Language Support: English, Spanish, French, Italian, German & Russian.

changelog.change_log:
- Speech Recognition Fix
- More Natural Conversations
- Voice Input UI (See Your Voice Input)

- Fixed Rosa Speech Recognition (she sometimes could not hear players)
- Minor Visual and UI Improvements
- Minor Fixes

- Multi Language Support (English, Spanish, French, Italian, German, Russian)
- Improved AI Conversations
- New Comfortable Seat
- Cheaper Prices
- Visual Enhancements
- Tablet Scrolling Fix
- Minor Adjustments

Thank you very much for your feedback! I greatly appreciate it. 
Please feel free to share any suggestions on how I can further enhance the app.
